clinicalr 0.2.1
  • Reference

Calculate the body surface area (BSA).

Source: R/bsa.R
calculate_bsa.Rd

Calculate the body surface area (BSA), according to Monsteller or Du Bois.

calculate_bsa(weight, height, method = "Monsteller")

calculate_bsa_monsteller(weight, height)

calculate_bsa_du_bois(weight, height)

Arguments

weight

Weight (kg).
height

Height (cm).
method

Formula to calculate BSA. Options are: "Monsteller" (default), "Du Bois".

Value

BSA (\(m^2\)).

Functions

  • calculate_bsa_monsteller: Calculate the body surface area (BSA) according to Monsteller.

  • calculate_bsa_du_bois: Calculate the body surface area (BSA) according to Du Bois

Caveats

None at this time.

References

Monsteller: https://doi.org/10.1056%2FNEJM198710223171717; Du Bois: https://doi.org/10.1001%2Farchinte.1916.00080130010002.

See also

set_units, drop_units
